archimate:ApplicationInterface.name: IF-00844 Blackboard and Marking tool
archimate:ApplicationInterface.documentation: To integrate Blackboard with the UWE Marking Tool - used for off line and on-line marking. Calls 'grade extract' stored procedure on Blackboard database and saves the data to 'Grade extract table' custom table read by ISIS. Academic initiates this when a set of marks is available for release.
